DOC.brief_summary: This study is to observe efficacy and safety after T-Gel 1% treatment in delayed puberty adolescents. Subjects who complete this trial may enter a 3 month extension study (UMD-01-090E).
DOC.brief_title: Observation Study of T-Gel (1%) in Treatment of Adolescent Boys With Hypogonadism
DOC.criteria: Primary or secondary hypogonadism or constitutional delay in growth and puberty (CDGP) Skin intolerance to alcohol or allergy to soy Generalized skin disease Contraindication to testosterone or androgen products
